## count() function

Reducer which ignores incoming values and instead only counts them, optionally using given `start` and `step` counter values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function count(offset?: number, step?: number): Reducer<number, any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  offset | <code>number</code> |  |
|  step | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Reducer<number, any>`
